SELECT c.id, c.article_id as articleId, a.title as articleTitle, c.user_id as userId, u.username, u.avatar as userAvatar, c.content, c.parent_id as parentId, c.create_time as createTime, c.update_time as updateTime FROM comment c LEFT JOIN article a ON c.article_id = a.id LEFT JOIN user u ON c.user_id = u.id
AND c.article_id = #{articleId}
AND u.username LIKE CONCAT('%', #{username}, '%')
AND c.content LIKE CONCAT('%', #{content}, '%')
ORDER BY c.create_time DESC
